name: peppermint
text: If the other person is speechless, you've won the argument.

name: mc_white
text: Apparently this weight issue has been weighing on Ray's mind for quite awhile.

name: i_love_kate
text: *rimshot*

name: kylemcjuicy
text: A comment left by kylemcjuicy was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, ohmygooses, Connellingus, rascaldom)

name: epicurus
text: A comment left by epicurus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Crowpaw, sevenarts, isunklower)

name: saint
text: ...but do you know how I feel?

name: havenless
text: A comment left by havenless was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, c_dizzle, DiamondMonster, Connellingus)

name: _cheesekayke
text: A comment left by _cheesekayke was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by sevenarts, StagnantDisplay, Professorbun, RBisme, Shinkicka)

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by goocifer, aquamuffin, Lumus, Zem)

name: c_dizzle
text: THANK you.

name: spicyponyhead
text: I thought at first this said "a pissed man with goats"

name: stuart
text: All in the same 72 hours.

name: nikopol
text: Well then Ray would very much be the kind of person who would know if you are or are not a guy who does such things.

name: c_dizzle
text: Also killed a deer in agony during Philippe's last run-away-from-home arc (no link...not gonna find it). I wonder why he wouldn't kill a head? Though...I guess it looked more angry than it did in pain. ...Huh.

name: blarghamagarky
text: it was a fucking expensive head

name: kochipoik
text: Nah I don't think Ray would have much problems with it, but the fact is that Teodor isn't the guy who shoots a head

name: i_love_kate
text:
It had weekly check-ups to make sure it wasn't being stored in direct sunlight or whatever. A gunshot wound might just be in breach of whatever agreements he made when buying it.

In fact, I might just go as far as to say that a celebrity's head with a bullet in it might just be 5 o'clock news.

name: c_dizzle
text: I'd argue that some celebreties lives are as important as poo-blankets.

name: greenkoolayd
text: ebay platinum reserve is like, the e-black market, but you have to treat keith moons head like its a delicate piece of crystal and abide by some sort of contract?  thats freakin dumb.

name: greenkoolayd
text: phillipe went with nice pete to the scary ice cream joint where wilford brimly worked the counter.  is that the same as running away?

name: radarjammer
text: This doesn't deserve 5 lames.

name: dougthehead
text: It's great how this strip takes a complete left turn in the middle.  "WELL MAYBE YOU'RE A LITTLE STUPID WITH YOUR MONEY, RAY!  YOU EVER THINK ABOUT THAT?"

name: leon_sumbitches
text: A comment left by leon_sumbitches was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, goocifer, Connellingus)

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Nothing kills a fight like "YOU and I should probably lose some WEIGHT!"

name: augeno13
text: A comment left by augeno13 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by missbee, Moolah, riotdejaneiro, isunklower, keithcozz)

name: senseihollywood
text:
you know what I like?

I like how Ray tempers the thing a little :"YOU and I should probably lose some weight"

he's not even putting it all on Teo ...what an upright dude

"I know man! I know what you mean!"
this was what Good Ray was like.

name: blueloggy
text: Ray is so decent, even in the middle of an argument. Def. an upright dude.

name: snatch22
text: I love this strip, but I don't quite get the thing about killing a perch.

name: paco
text: When you kill a perch, or any fish, you can either stab it of let it suffocate. Ray is saying that the head will die soon, just like a perch left on land.

name: spicyponyhead
text:
Last time I went fishing, I was about 10 years old with my grandma in Alaska. I caught a smallish flounder, and we tried to beat it to death with a mallet. Damned thing wouldn't die, and we had to carry it home in a plastic bag, all flapping and twitching for ages.

It was truly the Saddest Thing.

name: nurdbot
text: Anyone notice how the head of Keith Moon is happy of the chaos he has done as Ray carries him close to his cat breast?

name: killerlimpet
text: alt text: The head looks so smug when Ray protects it

name: jesler729
text: I swear to god, the alt text used to be different.

name: jesler729
text: Dang I have no recollection of posting this and now I desperately want to know what I was previously under the impression the alt text was

name: wehavemagnums
text: You know a strip is good when people can't help but quote it straight away. YOU ARE A LOT OF THINGS, BUT YOU ARE NOT A GUY WHO SHOOTS A HEAD!

name: morganization
text: teodor's facial expressions and gestures are so good in this one

name: centipede_damascus
text: He wants to see why he's in pain!

name: cousinted
text:
Even in death, Keith Moon remains Keith Moon.

I love the patronising smile as Ray carries him away.

name: woodenteeth
text: Very close to the best Achewood strip ever. "I know man. I know what you mean". Damn.

name: josher
text: Teador is looking a bit chubby in this one, it has to be admitted.

name: scriblerus
text:
I let this sit at the top of "You Haven't Seen These Highest Rated" for a week, just because I knew how much I'd enjoy it again and I wanted to drag it out.

But I was wrong. It's so much better.

name: juanclaudius
text:
Is it sad that I've had conversations ridiculously similar to this?

I mean, without the whole, y'know, Keith Moon's head thing.

name: stuart
text: This strip is 3 rows of awesome.

name: woodenteeth
text: Probably one of the best strips there is... too much goodness here. I don't give 5's out much. And yet... count 'em. V.

name: woodenteeth
text: I can't lame myself, but I'm making it clear that while random-comic surfing I made a virtually identical comment above. Can you blame me though, do you know what I mean?

name: falseprophet
text: I lamed it for you and chubbied your graceful admission of guilt.

name: tropicana
text: The first time I read this strip, I was sitting in a very quiet library, and I laughed so hard that I had to leave. This is quite possibly one of my favourite strips ever.

name: tragicone
text: Ray walked away as Teodor could say nothing.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Emeril: Some of the sport from the Master Council

name: hamscout
text:
That is a sweet over-the-shoulder stare down...

...each of Ray's eyebrows a perfect tilde of indignant frustration...

name: mcwee
text: Christ, I just had basically exactly this same fight with a friend.

name: jhunter
text: dude if you let me come round and use Keith Moons head as a deadly biting basketball I will be your best friend forever

name: chloraloner
text: I'm putting a clause in my will that my family must reenact this scene at my funeral to get their inheritance.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Keith seems so happy in the last few frames.

name: duperando
text: I don't know how Ray telling Teodor that they should lose some weight is a moot point, but apparently it is an epic argue-winner. Also, that over-the-shoulder glance that Ray does in the second-to-last panel is just pure awesome.

name: rasalghul
text: This is turning into the best arc ever.  A rollercoaster ride, for sure.
